## Introduction to Probability

- Probability is a measurement how likely something happen.

it is a mathematical framework to describe and analyze random phenomena.

wE CANNOT PREDICT THE RANDOM PHENOMENA

e.g)

Tossing a coin 

- head(H) or tails (T)

- We say that the probabiluty of the coin landing H is 1/2
- and the probability of the coin landing T is 1/2
